desc: Fiber Clear is a safe, effective filtration media that can be used instead of diatomaceous earth, which is a known carcinogenic. Use Fiber Clear in any pool filtration system: Sand, Filter or Cartridge.

layout.text: With Fiber Clear in your pool’s filtration system, being cleaner also means being "greener," (environmentally, that is.)
With Fiber Clear you can achieve a sparkling, “polished water” look without the use of clarifiers, polymers or harmful D.E.
